titleStmt.title: Iacobus Dei gratia Magnæ Britanniæ, Franciæ & Hiberniæ Rex, fidei defensor, &c. Omnibus quorum interest hasce nostras legere, salutem. Gens Sylvia quæ a Sylvis ducit nominis originem, celebris est in multorum populorum monumentis, maximè vero apud Romanos ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed: die sexta Aprilis. Ano Domini M.DC.XXIV. Signatum sic. Jacobus R.
A recognition of services of Thomas Wood and family.
Printed after the Restoration from an MS. document in Rymer's "Foedera", cf. 2nd ed., XVI (1727), p.720 (under the date 1612)--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
